```{python}
# 1) Load the raw text
with open("conlang.txt", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    text = f.read()
    
#print(text) 

words_all = [w.lower() for w in text.split()]
print(words_all[:15])

vowels = {"a", "e", "i", "o", "u" , "ɜ"}    

# find all of the vowels in the conlang, and list them here.

words_v = []
words_no_v = []

for wd in words_all:
  if any(chr in vowels for chr in wd):
    words_v.append(wd)
  else:
    words_no_v.append(wd)
    
print("-------") #to help clean up printed space
    
print("First 30 words (with vowels):")
print(words_v[:30])
print()

print("Counts:")
print("  total tokens after edge-punct clean:", len(words_all))
print("  kept (has ≥1 vowel):", len(words_v))
print("  removed (no vowels):", len(words_no_v))

```
